text: The 39th Evacuation Hospital was part of the Medical Branch of the United States Army during World War II. It received the Meritorious Unit Commendation for service rendered during the Battle of the Bulge. The following are the members of 39th Evacuation Hospital: Clint E. Adams, Harry Adams (Maj, MC), Monica Ames, Paul Anderson, Dotty Ayers, Burlah Barkley (2d Lt, MAC), Theresa M. Baumgartner (1st Lt, ANC), Ralph Benson, Sam Biondiollie, Alice E.
